text: One Piece is an anime television series based on the manga series of the same name. As of 2025, it has more than 1,100 episodes. == Series overview == == Episodes == === Seasons 1–8=== * List of One Piece episodes (seasons 1–8) ** Season 1 ** Season 2 ** Season 3 ** Season 4 ** Season 5 ** Season 6 ** Season 7 ** Season 8 === Seasons 9–14 === * List of One Piece episodes (seasons 9–14) ** Season 9 ** Season 10 ** Season 11 ** Season 12 ** Season 13 ** Season 14 === Seasons 15–present === * List of One Piece episodes (seasons 15–present) ** Season 15 ** Season 16 ** Season 17 ** Season 18 ** Season 19 ** Season 20 ** Season 21 == Other websites == * Category:One Piece episodes
